about_the_game:
Real Pharmacy Simulator: Immerse yourself in the world of pharmacy business!

Welcome to the exciting world of pharmaceuticals, where your every decision can change people's lives! In Real Pharmacy Simulator, you become not just a seller, but a real pharmacy owner. Are you ready to take on the challenge and build a successful business, balancing between profit and caring for your customers' health?

Become a real pharmacist

  • Take on the role of a pharmacy owner and chief salesperson.
  • Interact with visitors, learn about their needs, and help solve their health problems.

Immerse yourself in realistic gameplay

  • Order various medicines through the computer system.
  • Organize the pharmacy space: take boxes with delivered goods and arrange them on the shelves of your choice.
  • Use a shopping basket and scanner when serving customers.
  • Scan items and keep track of the total cost on the computer. Don't make mistakes, or you'll lose money!

Develop professional skills

  • Memorize symptoms and drug effects to serve customers faster.
  • Level up various skills that help you in your work.
  • Use the computer to search for information about drugs and their applications.

Adapt to dynamic demand

  • Monitor factors affecting the number of customers and demand for specific products.
  • Consider the time of day, weather, customer mood, and events in the city.
  • Be prepared for various situations: rain can cause increased demand for cold remedies, while a crime wave might boost demand for bandages. Is the city holding a "Health Week"? Be ready for increased demand for dietary supplements and vitamins.

Maintain cleanliness and order

  • Take care of the cleanliness in the pharmacy premises.
  • Be prepared for unpleasant situations: some visitors may dirty the premises with their muddy boots and... human excrement.
  • Regularly wash floors and windows to maintain the pharmacy's attractiveness to customers.

Improve your business

  • Level up skills to simplify work and increase profits.
  • Improve medication delivery speed and increase markup on goods.
  • Unlock new abilities, such as memorizing symptoms or disabling blocking functions of the payment terminal.

Manage pricing

Study skills that allow you to set prices for goods independently.
Balance between your profit and the affordability of goods for customers.
Remember that excessively high prices can drive customers away.

Choose your path: the dark or light side of business

Dark path:
  • Use the black market for drugs to save money. The medicines are of dubious quality, of course, but do you really care about other people's lives and health?
  • Ignore restrictions on selling prescription drugs for greater profit.
  • Bribe inspectors to avoid legal problems.
  • Be careful - one mistake can ruin your business!
Light path:
  • Help customers in difficult financial situations - and they might help you when necessary. Or maybe not.
  • Sell people cheap alternatives to expensive drugs that help with certain symptoms.
  • Strictly follow the laws and rules established by the government.
  • Pay bills and taxes on time.
  • Try not to go bankrupt while following all the rules!

Relax in Relax mode.

Enjoy calm medication trading without unnecessary worries. Turn off story events and complex conditions. Play your own music from a folder in the save directory using the audio player. The perfect mode for relaxation and simple pharmacy management.
Immerse yourself in the world of Real Pharmacy Simulator, where every day is a new challenge! Can you build a successful pharmacy business while balancing ethics and profit? Your decisions can change not only the fate of your pharmacy but also the lives of many people in the city.
Become a hero in a white coat or a cold-blooded businessman - the choice is yours! Download Real Pharmacy Simulator right now and start your exciting journey into the world of pharmaceutical business.

movies.name: Real Pharmacy Simulator Early Access Trailer #2

name: Real Pharmacy Simulator

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4570
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce GTX 1050Ti
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-9400f
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce GTX 1660Ti
  • Storage: 8 GB available space

short_description: Become the owner of a pharmacy in Real Pharmacy Simulator! Manage the business, serve customers, and balance profit with ethics. Order medicines, organize the space, and decide how to run your business - honestly or riskily. Your decisions will determine the fate of the pharmacy!
supported_languages: English, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Russian
